title: Bug 49299: Misleading information about custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: The Servlet 3.0 specification (ch.7.1.1) incorrectly states that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting. This is not true in the current trunk of the servlet implementation, as the default 'jsessionid' is used instead.
OB: The Servlet 3.0 specification incorrectly claims that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
EB: The specification should be updated to correctly describe the behavior.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Deploy the attached war file 'cookiename.war'. 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/.
